original_text: After death, wicked people can no longer cause any trouble. People who have become tired can rest. After death, wicked people can no longer cause any trouble.
korean_text: 거기서는 악한 자가 소요를 그치며 거기서는 피곤한 자가 쉼을 얻으며

sentences.original_text: can no longer cause any trouble.
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 아무 문제를 일으킬 수 없다.
